title: BOOKSTORE ORB / bookstorerug
description: Second Shivers in the coat quest. Points you to the Harbour. Normal diff.

links.title: You: "Yes, I am here! What must I do?"
links.text: Yes, I am here! What must I do?

links.title: Shivers: "Listen within the place of industry..."
links.text: Listen within the place of industry, where power and structure join perfectly… My power here is too weak...

links.title: You: "I'm here, just like you asked. What..."
links.text: I'm here, just like you asked. What do you want?

links.title: Shivers: "I want to be found... But I need to..."
links.text: I want to be found... But I need to be heard... Listen within the place of industry, where power and structure join perfectly…

links.title: You: "You again?! Come on, what's this al..."
links.text: You again?! Come on, what's this all about?

links.title: Shivers: "It's about union and reunion... But..."
links.text: It's about union and reunion... But I am weak... Listen within the place of industry, where power and structure join perfectly…
